PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-00972025-02-14ECCC, HC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding Toxic Substances to Part 2 of Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO PART 2 OF SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 in order to add dechlorane plus and decabromodiphenyl ethane to the List of Toxic Substances.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0027 Publication Date: 2025-02-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: ORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO PART 2 OF SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 in order to add dechlorane plus and decabromodiphenyl ethane to the List of Toxic Substances.
